title: Concussive Smash
content:
Concussive Smash Class Actions 7~19 Damage 1d10+5Slashing +1d4Psychic Possibly Dazes your target. They can't take reactions and lose the Dexterity bonus to their Armour Class. 2 turns Melee CON Save Attack Roll Short Rest Action

Concussive Smash

1d10+5Slashing +1d4Psychic

Possibly Dazes your target. They can't take reactions and lose the Dexterity bonus to their Armour Class.

Melee CON Save Attack Roll Short Rest

Concussive Smash is an Action in Baldur's Gate 3. Actions can be used in both
